name: Spicy Mango Salad
author: MIREILLE67
summary: This is a smashing side dish, with an interesting mix of spicy, sweet and sour! Try it and it will be one of your favorites! Delicious with BBQ's or Asian food.
ingredients: 4 medium mangos - peeled, seeded, and cubed
salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
directions: Place the mango cubes into a serving bowl
In a separate bowl, whisk together the lime juice and olive oil
Season with red pepper flakes, cilantro, shallots, salt and pepper
Whisk briefly, then pour over the mangos
Stir to coat, then cover and refrigerate for about 30 minutes to blend the flavors before serving
